node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，7 月 15 日開始發燒及咳嗽，與 #1772 、#1778 宗個案患者為屯門眼科醫院同事。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and no travel history, having developed fever and coughs on July 15. She is a colleague of patients #1772 and #1778 at Tuen Mun Eye Centre.

groups.name_zh: 屯門中央廣場富臨酒家
groups.name_en:
Tuen Mun Central Square Fulum
Restaurant
groups.description_zh: 7 月 11 日在屯門中央廣場富臨酒家舉行的 20  席生日聚會，及後有多名出席者確診。另外也有不同日子到訪該富臨酒家的食客確診。
groups.description_en: A birthday celebration event with 20 tables was held on Jul 11 at Fulum Restaurant, Tuen Mun Central Square. Some of the participants were found to be confirmed cases. There are some confirmed cases had visited the same restaurant.

groups.description_zh: 屯門眼科中心有 4 名員工確診，分別是 3 名文員及 1 名運作服務助理。3 名文員是負責收銀以及將病歷交予病人，每日要接觸約 200 名病人，可能因為病人的八達通、錢或者醫生介紹信感染。

node.location_zh: 華都商場 雲南小鍋米線
node.location_en: Waldorf Shopping Arcade 雲南小鍋米線
Tuen Mun Central Square Fulum Restaurant
